name: Lieutenant Watts (V)
Lore: 'Native of Corulag. Watts'' gunnery skills produce devastating results. Temporarily assigned to Kuat Drive Yards to work on prototype AT-ST weaponry.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, if at a battleground site, may take a weapon from Lost Pile into hand to cancel a Force drain at a related site.',
